channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Winx Club - The Magic Is Back
channel.desc: Excitement builds as Musa?s concert in Magixia approaches, but her nerves skyrocket when a mysterious agent shows interest.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Football Academy
channel.desc: Under-12s Carter and Alex jet off to Portugal for a huge tournament, Riley and Maddie take on Crystal Palace in the cup, and under-10 Julian takes on Spurs legend Sandro in The Maradona 7.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Steve Backshall is in the Kalahari to search for its weirdest residents. From aardwolves to aardvarks and mischievous meerkats, Steve is hoping for some Deadly firsts.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: A reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio as they attempt to win the regional dance championships. With Emily and Stephanie gone, Giselle auditions to be the new member of A-Troupe. Riley offers to help James learn the routine he has been missing while not in the studio.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter
channel.desc: Joel tries Kite Foiling with Olympic Gold medallist Ellie Aldridge ? can he navigate a board across the waves using the wind power of a kite.
